subject: Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Less than two months after their Super Bowl victory, the Giants were back at work Monday as players returned to Giants Stadium for the beginning of the team’s off-season conditioning program, the team said. The news media were not allowed to attend the workouts, and the Giants refused to say how many players took part.
